title: eq-m2o
description: The EqM2oComponent is an Angular component used for rendering an editable input with autocomplete functionality. It supports various customization options and emits selected items to the parent component.

inputs.name: disabled
inputs.description: Marks the field as readonly.

inputs.name: required
inputs.description: Marks the field as mandatory.

inputs.name: nullable
inputs.description: Allows the field to be nullable.

inputs.name: placeholder
inputs.description: Placeholder text for the input.

inputs.name: title
inputs.description: Title for the widget.

inputs.name: hint
inputs.description: Hint/helper text for the widget.

inputs.name: mode
inputs.description: Sets the mode of the component.

inputs.name: entity
inputs.description: Full name of the entity to load.

inputs.name: id
inputs.description: ID of the object to load as preset value.

inputs.name: fields
inputs.description: Extra fields to load in addition to 'id' and 'name'.

inputs.name: domain
inputs.description: Additional domain for filtering result set.

inputs.name: controller
inputs.description: Specific controller to use for fetching data.

inputs.name: params
inputs.description: Extra parameters specific to the chosen controller.

inputs.name: autofocus
inputs.description: Autofocuses the input field.

inputs.name: noResult
inputs.description: Message displayed when no match is found.

inputs.name: displayWith
inputs.description: Custom method for rendering the items.

inputs.name: hint_always
inputs.description: Determines whether the hint should always be visible.

inputs.name: size
inputs.description: Size of the input field.

inputs.name: panelWidth
inputs.description: CSS value for the panel width (dropdown).

inputs.name: initialSelectedItem
inputs.description: Currently selected item.

outputs.name: blur
outputs.description: Emits when the input field loses focus.
